Translations.Text: This should be cherished by Quraysh
The way they cherish the journey of the winter and summer
So let them serve the Lord of this sanctuary
The One who fed them from hunger, and protected them from fear
Do you know who rejects the system
It is the one who mistreats the orphans
And does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who reach out
But who are totally heedless of their contact-method
They only want to be seen
And they deter from helping others
Therefore, you shall reach out to your Lord, and sacrifice
Indeed your rival will be the loser
